prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon with a mischievous expression and a swirling, ethereal body.
Imagine a psychic Pokemon with vibrant colors and magical floating rings around it.
Design a mythical creature that can warp space and time with its power.
Generate a Pokemon that has a playful personality and loves to explore hidden realms.
Show me a legendary Pokemon that embodies the essence of mystery and magic.
Make a whimsical Pokemon with a unique shape and a captivating aura.
Give me a creature that blends colors in an enchanting way, representing its psychic abilities.
